hooks.prompt: Before completing, verify documentation is current: (1) Code changes → update comments/docstrings. (2) Architecture changes → update CLAUDE.md/README. (3) agi-core plugin changes → update ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md with current version, agent/skill/command counts, and MCP servers. (4) New features → update user docs. If docs are current OR no changes made, return {"decision": "approve"}. If updates needed, return {"decision": "block", "reason": "[specific files]"} and continue.
